page.title: 20Communications
page.content: My father works for British Tekecom in the British Telecom Tower in London. He installs new telephone exchanges and sometimes goes on week long courses to learn new techniques. British Telecom service maintain and install telephones and make sure that all telephone lines are working properly. Most homes have at least one telephone and they are used for keeping in touch, social chatting and urgent messages such as accidents and business. For non-urgent and business calls it costs at least 6p for 8 minutes. The first main post office in Redbridge was Ilford Post Office near the High Road. On top of Ilford Post Office is a big communication aerial which sends messages from Ilford to Romford Post Office.
